subject: Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Michael Jordan, who won six N.B.A. titles and five M.V.P. awards, was inducted into the Hall of Fame, alongside David Robinson, John Stockton, Jerry Sloan and C. Vivian Stringer.
snippet: Michael Jordan, who won six N.B.A. titles and five M.V.P. awards, was inducted into the Hall of Fame, alongside David Robinson, John Stockton, Jerry Sloan and C. Vivian Stringer.
